participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and energetic, loves music and gaming with a vibrant style.
participant_1.background: Two dogs live with me. I've short hair. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. I go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, enjoys social events and has a playful attitude.
participant_2.background: My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I help out at the food bank occasionally. I am a party animal. I'm deathly afraid of heights. I own a cat and a dog.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves.
i'm a blonde girl with really short hair.
i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings.
my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.
Please evaluate the whole dialog using one of the buttons below

Select a profile which, in your opinion, belongs to your partner: 

1️⃣:
i play a lot of call of duty.
on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.
i like donuts.
my favorite band is the insane clown posse.
i drive a ford pinto.
2️⃣:
i like to tan in tanning beds.
i'm high maintenance.
i diet a lot.
i love spending money.

Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
